subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A high pitch from Josh Beckett to Bobby Abreu as time was being called touched off a bench-clearing incident Sunday in the first inning of the Los Angeles Angels’ 5-4 victory over the visiting Boston Red Sox.
snippet: A high pitch from Josh Beckett to Bobby Abreu as time was being called touched off a bench-clearing incident Sunday in the first inning of the Los Angeles Angels’ 5-4 victory over the visiting Boston Red Sox.
